overview: Mad (stylized as MAD) is an American animated sketch comedy television series produced by Warner Bros. Animation.[2] The series was based on Mad magazine, where each episode is a collection of short animated parodies of television shows, films, video games, celebrities, and other media, using various types of animation (CGI, claymation, stop-motion, photoshopped imagery, etc.) instead of the usual animation style that Warner Bros. Animation is known for.
title: CARTOON NETWORKS MAD
